Sep 17, 2016

Yesterday Was Batman Day

Yesterday was the third annual Batman Day, although I didn’t know that when I went out during my lunch break to pick up a copy of what’s widely regarded as one of the greatest ever Batman stories ever written — Batman: The Killing Joke by Alan Moore and illustrated by Brian Bolland.

If you’ve been following my film diary you’ll already know that I watched the animated version of The Killing Joke quite recently and I enjoyed it immensely, so getting hold of the deluxe hardback version of the graphic novel has been on my to-do list for the last few weeks.

If, like me, you’re fascinated by pretty much anything and everything to do with Batman, and in particular his arch-nemesis The Joker, you won’t find anything that’s better written or more beautifully illustrated than The Killing Joke.

Originally published at Deep Thought.
